General.Name: Hongbo Co Ltd
General.Description: Hongbo Co., Ltd. engages in the security printing business in China and internationally. The company also offers lottery new channel services, including blockchain lottery, new media marketing service system, technology platform development, etc. In addition, it is involved in the books and high-end packaging business; printing of packaging and decoration printed matters, anti-counterfeiting tickets, and other printed matters; publication printing services; and sports event and marketing planning services. The company was formerly known as Fujian Hongbo Printing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hongbo Co., Ltd. in August 2013. Hongbo Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.
